nodes.text: Flatsculp or flatsculpt was a two-dimension form of art popularized by the Vaathkree.
The planet Oordo III was made famous by its flatsculps.
The flatsculp "Stars and Moons" was originally owned by Moff Ammar until it was stolen by Cunbus Locb around 1 BBY.
The lobby of the Bakur Memorial Building on Bakura was decorated with flatsculps and other works of art by native Bakuran artists.
